author: Matthew Impelli
title: The U.S. Now Has More Coronavirus Cases Than Italy and Spain Combined
description: The U.S. now has more confirmed cases of the new coronavirus than Italy and Spain's combined number.
content:
The U.S. now has more confirmed cases of the new coronavirus than Italy and Spain combined.
According to a tracker provided by Johns Hopkins University, the U.S. has at least 226,374 coronavirus cases while Italy and Spain combine for 225,480, with 115,242 a… [+2420 chars]
